pricing.title: Your Core Protection Subscription
pricing.subtitle: One simple subscription that unlocks professional emergency protection. Add optional extras — Family Access, Regional Call Centers, and Safety Devices — anytime. Activate instantly in the app.
pricing.familyDesc: After you join, you can invite trusted family members or carers to your dashboard. They'll have secure access to your emergency profile and protection status, receive instant alerts, view GPS location during an SOS, and help coordinate a rapid response. All data is encrypted and GDPR-compliant, with granular permission controls for complete peace of mind.
pricing.safetyProductsDesc: Enhance your safety with our Bluetooth-enabled emergency devices that work seamlessly with all subscription plans
pricing.productSpecs: Complete product specifications and setup information

hero.description: ICE SOS Lite provides multilingual emergency protection with AI Guardian, professional call center access, and family connectivity — globally available.

features.title: Complete Emergency Protection Suite
features.description: Professional emergency protection with global call center access, Bluetooth device support, and AI monitoring — starting from €4.99/month with worldwide coverage.

items.title: 24/7 Emergency Response
items.description: One-tap SOS activation with instant GPS location sharing to emergency contacts and professional call center.

items.title: AI Health Monitoring
items.description: Intelligent wellness tracking with Premium Protection plan including AI-powered health insights.

items.title: Global Call Center Access
items.description: Professional emergency response coordination available 24/7 with multilingual support worldwide.

items.title: Family Emergency Alerts
items.description: Instant SOS notifications to up to 5 emergency contacts with Family Connection and Premium plans.

items.title: GPS Location Tracking
items.description: Real-time location sharing during emergencies with precise coordinates sent to responders.

items.title: Bluetooth Device Support
items.description: Compatible with ICE SOS Bluetooth Pendant for hands-free emergency activation up to 100m range.

appDownload.title: Professional Mobile App
appDownload.subtitle: Download ICE SOS Lite - Your complete emergency protection platform
appDownload.heroDescription: Professional emergency protection platform for individuals and families. Download free, then activate your premium protection features.

emergencySOS.title: Emergency SOS

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Works worldwide with full multilingual support and 24/7 monitoring

instantSetup.title: Instant Setup
instantSetup.description: Ready to use in minutes with simple configuration and onboarding

bullets.noFees: No setup fees or hidden costs

appDownload.cancellationDescription: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period. Hardware purchases are non-refundable but carry a 1-year warranty.

appPreview.title: Experience Your Emergency Protection App
appPreview.description: See exactly what you'll get with ICE SOS Lite. This interactive preview shows your personal emergency dashboard, one-tap SOS activation, family connections, and Bluetooth device integration.
appPreview.note: This preview demonstrates the actual app interface you'll use for emergency protection.

regionalCenterES.intro: 24/7 bilingual emergency support for residents and visitors in Spain.
regionalCenterES.heroDescription: Our trained agents speak English and Spanish and can coordinate emergency services, provide live translation, and assist with follow-up.
whatWeDo: Live translation between English and Spanish during emergency calls
Coordination with local emergency services and first responders
Follow-up and case updates until resolution
whenToContact: You need help communicating with emergency services in Spain
You prefer to speak in English or Spanish during an urgent situation
You are traveling in Spain and need assistance
You need help coordinating with family or caregivers
You have an urgent device or subscription issue impacting your safety
regionalCenterES.confidentialityDesc: All calls are recorded for safety and training. Personal data is handled according to our Privacy Policy.
regionalCenterES.noEmergency: If you are in immediate danger, call 112 (Spain's emergency number).
